item.description:

[quote=“I Vain I”]ActionHandler.firstClickObject

case PORTAL_ID: if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(ITEM, AMOUNT)) { c.getItems.deleteItem(ITEM, c.getItems.getItemSlot(ITEM), AMOUNT); c.getPA().startTeleport(1864, 4379, 2, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Good luck!"); } else { c.sendMessage("You need a key."); return; } break; [/quote]
I got 0 errors but when i used the key on the portal it didnt work
Edit: Nvm it worked thanks.
